sentences.cn: ...充满着真实情怀和热爱的歌曲。

sentences.en: Full of militancy and revolutionary ardour, the people of all nationalities in the country are working hard for the realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 全国各族人民意气风发, 斗志昂扬,为实现四个现代化而奋战.

sentences.en: He shows great ardor, ardour for fame.
sentences.cn: 他对名誉篌表示出热切的渴.

sentences.en: Her unresponsiveness failed to cool his ardour.
sentences.cn: 她对他无动于衷,这并未能冷却他的感情.

sentences.en: His ardour for the cause inspired his followers.
sentences.cn: 他对事业的热情激励著他的追随者.

sentences.en: His political ardour led him into many arguments.
sentences.cn: 他对政治的热情使他多次投入争论.

sentences.en: Nothing daunted the ardour of the merchant navy.
sentences.cn: 任何困难都不能挫败商船船员的锐气.

sentences.en: Their ardour was damped by my critics.
sentences.cn: 我的批评给他们的热情泼了冷水.

sentences.en: They are such young man who have patriotic ardour.
sentences.cn: 他们是有爱国热情的年轻人.
